notes: irregular verb; compound tenses use essere

example_sentence_english: As a child I was rushing right away.
You were rushing as soon as I called.

translation_english: he was rushing/she was rushing/you (formal) were rushing

example_sentence_english: We were rushing at the sound.
Yesterday I have rushed to help.
Yesterday I have rushed to help.

translation_english: he has rushed/she has rushed/you (formal) have rushed
notes: used with auxiliary essere; also used as formal Lei

translation_english: he has rushed/she has rushed/you (formal) have rushed
notes: used with auxiliary essere; also used as formal Lei

example_sentence_english: We have rushed all of us.
